Package Boundary.MovieGoer

package Boundary.MovieGoer
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    Boundary
     
    Boundary.Staff
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DisplayBookingConfirmation
    Boundary/View Class to display booking confirmation after the movieGoer chooses Seats
    DisplayBookingHistoryBoundary
    Boundary/View Class to display the past booking history of the moviegoer if logged in as member, automatically provide details of past bookings else as a guest, enter email used to booked the ticket to check past bookings
    DisplayMovieDetailsBoundary
    Boundary/View Class to display the details of each movie after selecting one movie from the listing of the movies
    DisplayMovieGoerRegisterBoundary
    Boundary/View Class for moviegoers to register an account in order to log in as a member
    DisplayMovieListBoundary
    Boundary/View Class to list all the movies/ top 5 movies to the users, then afterwards users can proceed to check on the showschedules pertaining to the movie chosen
    DisplayReviewBoundary
    Boundary/View Class to display the review pertaining to a specific movie
    DisplaySearchMovieBoundary
    Boundary/View Class to search for a movie instead of listing all the movies
    DisplayShowTimeBoundary
    Boundary/View Class to display showScheduling based on a movie
    DisplayShowtimeDetailMenu
    Boundary/View Class representing a the Moviegoer to make a booking corresponding to a particular showtime
    DisplayTop5MoviesBoundary
    Boundary/View Class to display the Top 5 movies based on either rating, salesnumber or both (Only can be changed by system settings by Admin) or choose to book ticket as a guest
